books.title: Laskar Pelangi
books.author: Andrea Hirata
books.description: A novel that tells the story of ten children and their two teachers struggling to learn and make their dreams come true against the backdrop of poverty and prejudice in Belitung, Indonesia.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A romantic novel set in early 19th-century England, revolving around the themes of love, marriage, and societal expectations, primarily focusing on the spirited Elizabeth Bennet and the proud Mr. Darcy.
